```{r load_libraries}
library(here)
library(dplyr)
library(fs)
library(rmarkdown)
library(magrittr)
```

```{r choose_regerssion_rmds}
regression_rmds_1pct = c("../misc/downloading/atacama_download.Rmd",
                    "../misc/downloading/download_dada_references.Rmd",
                    "./demultiplex_with_fastq_multx.Rmd",
                    "./dada2_tutorial_1_6.Rmd",
                    "./alpha_diversity.Rmd",
                    "./absolute_abundance_plots.Rmd",
                    "./relative_abundance.Rmd")

render_params = list(
  atacama_ps_rds=path_expand("~/scratch/atacama_1pct/dada2/atacama_1pct.rds")
)
```

```{r run_render}
render_outdir=path_expand("~/scratch/atacama_1pct_render_run")
dir_create(render_outdir)
for (cur_rmd in regression_rmds_1pct){
  print(cur_rmd)
  render(cur_rmd, 
         output_format="html_document",
         params=render_params,
         output_dir=render_outdir)
}
```
